name: Robin QUILLIVIC, Ph.D.
bio: I am a post-doctoral researcher at CESSP/ISC-PIF, developing Clinical Decision Support Systems (CDSS) for PTSD detection through Natural Language Processing. I hold a Ph.D. in Computer Science from EPHE and lead the 150k€ CNRS-funded TALANT project on trauma language analysis.
research_interests: Natural Language Processing for mental health
